boardgame.name: Rising 5: Helden von Asteros
Rising 5: Runes of Asteros
Rising 5: Runes of Asteros 解密特攻
Rising 5: Runes of Asteros 解密特攻 (Chinese Version)
Rising 5: Runy Asteros
boardgame.description: Find the lost runes and save the planet Asteros!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A long, long time ago, the ancient King of Asteros confined the brutal monsters in the Rune Gate and sealed it with four divine runes. But five days ago, a mysterious evil power opened the gate and changed the code. Asteros is haunted by fear and disasters again! The wise leader ORAKL asked the Council of United Planets and they sent four famous agents: EKHO, HAL, ELLI and NOVA. ORAKL the wise and the four brave agents begin to fight against the evil powers to save Asteros. They must find the Code to reset the Gate and confine the monsters again. People call them _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Rising 5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, hoping they will be able to restore peace on the planet._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Rising 5: Runes of Asteros_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;nbsp;is a co-operative deduction and adventure game with a mobile phone application or a game master. Players must find the answer Code with the four Runes in the right arrangement before the evil power devours the planet. Players can explore the planet to collect energy or clues and to fight against evil monsters. When players try to unlock the code, the App or the game master will give signs that lead to right code._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;If players successfully find the code, they win; if the Darkness Level reaches the Red Moon because of the evil monsters or if the Character card deck is exhausted, the players lose the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: PRE-ORDER: Expected Delivery Q4 2017 This is a pre-order for the Kickstarter version of Rising 5: Runes of Asteros (Hero Pledge), all applicable stretch goals included.

I am selling my kickstarter collectors edition Version with minis and all expansions The game is brand new. I will ship insured through DHL which would be 8.99 within Germany and 15.99 for the rest of Europe. Feel free to check out my other offers on the geekmarket. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be moving soon so up until the summer I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be trying to get rid of quite a bit of stuff. Free pickup is possible in Kiel/Germany. I will ship outside of the EU but will have to insist on you contacting me first too discuss shipping and prices. Paypal is definitely preferred but I also accept direct tranfers. Please don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t hesitate contacting me in case you have any questions.

Played a couple of times. In great Condition, would say like new otherwise. Pictures upon request. Shipping within the Netherlands is possible with Kiala (€4), DHL (€5.75), DPD (€6.25) or PostNL (€6.5). Shipping with Kiala is possible, to Belgium and Luxembourg (€7.5), to France (€10) and to Spain (€14). Shipping to most countries in _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Western Europe_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; using DPD mail (cheapest) are €10.75 (Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Hungary, Luxembourg, Austria, Poland, Czech Republic, the UK). Shipping to other European countries would be €19.75 (Bulgaria, Estonia, Finland, Ireland, Italy, Croatia, Latvia, Lithuania, Romania, Slovenia, Slovakia, Spain and Sweden). Shipping to other countries is possible. Please contact me for a custom quote. Beware: I do not accept responsability for the shipping company delivering the package. I will pack the game and deliver it at a Package-office, but there my responsability ends. Lost packages in the mail are completely out of my control and therefore buyers risk. Of course, if requested I can provide insured package options/ Track _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;n Trace.

In-hand and Ready to Ship!! This is the Hero pledge, Rising 5 Collector_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition box including all unlocked Stretch Goals. The Hero pledge included Kickstarter exclusive : - Collector box - 6 coloured, 58 mm, minis - Artbook (illustrations and describtions of Rising 5 world by Vincent Dutrait) - XL board (65 cm X 65cm) - 3 alternate bosses and their relic items Buyers most pay for shipping. Willing to ship worldwide

Rising 5: Runes of Asteros - Collector_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s edition box. Complete Hero Pledge from Kickstarter, includes everything available for the game - all expansions, art book, large figurines, etc. Box opened, but in perfect unplayed condition. £110 including UK P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P and all other fee. See the Dice Tower review as Tom, Sam and Zee all loved it - a real rarity!
